level.heading: Legislative History of Law 9-118
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 9-118, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3801.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-60
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-60, see Historical and Statutory Notes following 42-2601.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: D.C. Law 12-59, title XI, § 1101 (44 DCR 7356), eff. March 20, 1998, provided for the temporary repeal of §§ 45-2221 to 45-2226 [1981 Ed.]. Section 2001(b) of D.C. Law 12-59 provided for expiration "after 225 days of its having taken effect."
